member.name: DCOMPOSITION_FRAME_STATISTICS
member.summary: Describes timing and composition statistics for a frame.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_FRAME_STATISTICS.lastFrameTime
member.summary: The time stamp of the last batch of commands to be processed by the composition engine.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_FRAME_STATISTICS.currentCompositionRate
member.summary: The rate at which the composition engine is producing frames, in frames per second.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_FRAME_STATISTICS.currentTime
member.summary: The current time as computed by the function.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_FRAME_STATISTICS.timeFrequency
member.summary: The units in which the lastFrameTime and currentTime members are specified, in Hertz.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_FRAME_STATISTICS.nextEstimatedFrameTime
member.summary: The estimated time when the next frame will be displayed.
